DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess effect three investigational drink contain three botanical differ combination versus placebo control , mood , psychological state , physical response , cognitive performance exposure observe multi-tasking stressor .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Acute Calming Effects Drinks Containing Herbal Extracts Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 49 year Selfreport good health Are exclude basis follow exclusion criterion Are smoker Have food allergy sensitivities ingredient contain investigational product foodstuff Currently take medication except contraceptive pill Have habitually use dietary supplement within last month ( define 3 consecutive day 4 day total ) Have sleep disturbance and/or take sleep aid medication Are employ job include night shift work Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) outside range 1835 kg/m2or weigh less 50kg 85kg . Have high blood pressure ( systolic 139 mm Hg diastolic 89 mm Hg ) Have history neurological , vascular psychiatric illness include epilepsy seizure ( exclude depressive illness anxiety ) Have history anxiety current diagnosis anxiety depression Are pregnant , try get pregnant breast feeding Have recent history ( within 12 month screen visit ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Alcohol abuse define 60g ( men ) / 40g ( woman ) pure alcohol per day ( 7 / 5.5 unit ) Have learn difficulty dyslexia Have visual impairment correct glass contact lens Have frequent migraine require medication ( equal 1 per month ) Have disorder blood ( e.g . anaemia , hemophilia , thrombocytosis ) Have heart disorder history vascular illness Have respiratory disorder require regular medication ( Note : participant asthma take medication occasionally/as require eligible study ) Have diagnosis type I type II diabetes Have history renal hepatic disease , severe diseases gastrointestinal tract ( e.g . iron accumulation , iron utilization disorder , hypercalcaemia , hypercalciuria ) , likely interfere metabolism/absorption/secretion product investigation Have health condition would prevent fulfillment study requirement Are currently past 8weeks participate clinical nutrition intervention study Have participate BPNRC 's recent stress study Do bank account ( required payment )
